data.text: @EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Fix your server!
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Is brea liom samhradh 😎
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Leave summer alone

@EU_Commission Available for me to establish personal relationship with one only, relatively clean in sexual habit. Salary cut to some extent is not big problem for me, standard, 25 million yearly. 💕💕
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU FFS

@EU_Commission @PhilHoganEU @EUAgri @danielrosarioEU Who recalls the EUs waste on the Butter shortage and indeed the wonky non straight fruit and vegetables! But here they are stroking their little tiny weeny egos

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU I'm very much for daylight saving time compared to not having it, but permanent DST would be even better. It's hard to really express that sentiment through this survey though.

@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Yeah fine, what’s your reaction to #Article13 being voted down? I hope you now acknowledge the concerns many people have about upload filter and directly state you are against mandatory algorithms that are supposed to filter out copyright violations - they do not work!

@EU_Commission @internetthought It's painfully obvious that the internet is under constant assault from proposals that try to limit its freedom and neutrality. All those proposals must be met with the fiercest resistance, not a centimeter of that freedom can ever be conceded.
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU 🤭 daar heeft iemand sjans  😋
@EU_Commission @Transport_EU @EBrivioEU @Bulc_EU Waste of time.

@EU_Commission @_Nickelfront Well, you're going to wreck life for small, niche websites that curate specialist news items from mainstream media providers, so why should people think your poorly thought out policy won't wreck memes, too?
@EU_Commission @freezydorito Saw this online, can't believe it's real.

@EU_Commission Cos. in North EU prefer girls for jobs than boys, so these beqheur guys co-habit with EU employed girls as JOBLESS but cared for by girlfriend with sex, till job is mustered. If no job is fixted in 7 years then separation! But her job bees & she finds another COC to SUC.

@EU_Commission ha publicado en el apartado de investigación e Innovación al proyecto @lynceus_project como una historia de éxito. Se trata de un sistema de localización inteligente para salvar vidas en el mar.@ATEVAL_ es uno de los 16 socios que participan en este proyecto.
@EU_Commission @VlaDiGanjah @JulienLocatell

@EU_Commission @internetthought So what this means is: My content is blocked intially and after requesting the platform owner to unban my content it will be acessable again? So there is still the issue, that my contnet is censored in the first place
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales you are either not understanding the ramifications of your own proposal or intentionally misleading. Neither is remotely okay.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales So, the @EU_Commission is saying:it's illegal, but if it's just a little bit it's ok..
Where is that stated in the law? And what is a little?? This ambiguity that might not be exploited now can surely be in the future, by less than correct enforcers, we don't need/want those laws
@EU_Commission @_Nickelfront Because this legislation has been purchased by copyright lobbyists?

@EU_Commission @internetthought What are you doing? You can’t use the EU Commission twitter account to spread disinformation and/or political views. 

Or has the Twitter account been bought by the copyright industry lobbyists as well?
@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @MorawieckiM BAN THE MEMES
@EU_Commission @GattAllan Just stop.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales What a terrible, terrible law. Of course it's obvious that the US isn't the only country where "right's holders" hold sway over the elected officials.

@EU_Commission Myself including almost every 2D artist I know, have gotten stuff stolen online, and sold on American, Russian or Chinese t-shirt/print sites. Even EU politicians have used Stolen Artwork in their campaigns. But I'm not sure if this proposal will actually be able to battle this.

@EU_Commission How exactly are the plans to combat Copyright infringement and theft? Places like Redbubble and Teespring are filled with Artwork, that has been stolen and re-posted? And how can it be battled without avoiding punishment for re-posting and sharing for exposure? (I'm an Artist)

@EU_Commission Hello !!
I have an idea to help you solve the issue of displaced persons and illegal immigrants to your country ..
If you are interested in this, please contact me ..
thank you
@EU_Commission Tomorrow don't do anything with the internet!Do you know how many inconveniences you will create?
@EU_Commission Thank you, Europe, for being with us!
@EU_Commission @freezydorito I don't know, reading the text you put up for vote sure didn't help the issue.
@EU_Commission @freezydorito seen on 9Gag. Let memes be memes.

@EU_Commission @_Nickelfront Hi, I'm acting for my client Paramount Pictures. That image is copyright to out series Star Trek: The Next Generation and your use of it is unauthorised. Please remove it.

See how this works? We have no Fair Use clause...
@EU_Commission @internetthought The nice thing about all this bureaucracy is that it lays the foundation for the EU's upcoming Meme Tax!

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales This is terrible legislation that will cripple innovation and free speech in Europe. As a European who cares about European progress deeply, I’m begging you: please reconsider.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Is that really so? Practically all content on Wikipedia, Wikimedia Commons etc can be reused commercially. Does that bother you?

@EU_Commission @internetthought (1) You've got to be kidding me, this is such bullshit @EU_Commission!! You have no idea what the hell kind of monster you'll be unleashing with this regressive, bureaucratic lobbyist scheme to hamper online content!

@EU_Commission Fam, you know Article 13 will cause more problems then it will solve, affecting the public to access infomation and denying them from exploiting images with each other? We all know you just wanna delete competitors and control the people. Come on fam!?
@EU_Commission says it is "following closely and with growing concern the ongoing developments in #Romania". #RuleOfLaw
@EU_Commission tells #Romania that it might open an infringement against the country after examining the reform of the criminal code which has been passed by the Romanian Parliament #RuleOfLaw
@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @MorawieckiM One and only truth spoken by PM Morawiecki was his name.
@EU_Commission I guess this is the last day I want to live in the EU, tomorrow I will be ashamed to be part of this. Article 11 and 13 is a joke. #SaveTheInternet

@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @MorawieckiM The Romanian parliament voted today the new Criminal Code, so what future are we talking about? Welcome to Romania, land of the corrupt and home of the thiefs.

@EU_Commission  1/3
The "collection camps" are worth it.  You tell us .
Why am I not surprised? It is about slave trade out of poverty.
Has nothing to do with asylum + values.

@EU_Commission Why just empty words about the new laws the Romanian parliament just voted? Why did no one from EU came to the sessions where they developed this awful laws? Soon Romania will be back to dictatorship!
@EU_Commission is looking more and more to parasitic organism draining money from #EU
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Really, did you think we were idiots? Because that is completely false. Please stop propagating misinformation.

@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @MorawieckiM stop the goebbels copyright law, stop your block freedom of expression and opinion. otherwise this will be just another of your filth with which you are heading towards destruction. the people are coming ...
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales What is all about it ?

@EU_Commission The #CustomsUnion can not be managed by legally heterogeneous public Authorities. Ok the Union CustomsCode but now we align the legal nature, structures and personnel of the #Customs Authorities of the Member States. @EU_Taxud @pierremoscovici
@EU_Commission @_Nickelfront Tommorow you couldn't use that picture could you?

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Dear @EU_Commission, Just because the online encylcopedia aspect of the wikimedia community might be exempted from article 13, doesn't mean that all wikis are. Wikis are much more than just an 'online encylopedia'.

@EU_Commission Zensur im Internet? Nein Danke! #DeleteArt13 #deleteart11 
Das Internet MUSS Zensurfrei bleiben! Keine Uploadfilter!
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Que gilipollas sois DEJAD DE CENSURARLO TODO CABRONES
@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @MorawieckiM #FutureofEurope without Britain included for the Brits is like UK without Scotland, Prince William without hair, Fish without Chips.
@EU_Commission y u want to ban memes ? :’( I cri everitym 😭😭
@EU_Commission keeps silence concerning the floods in #Romania ; they usually express "sympathy" or something of the kind @A_WintersteinEC
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales I do believe that Wikipedia “is not an academic reference” and is not recognised as such by many institutions of learning!
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales what's the test for "large amount"?

@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @MorawieckiM When you will discuss about Catalonia situation? Why you are silent. #FreeCatalonia Spain wants to eliminate all catalans opponents. Spain is violating  the catalans rights and you are silent.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Guys, you're explaining wikipedia to the founder of wikipedia. #wikisplaining much?
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales You don't know shit about this text, are you ?
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales .....
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Dear @EU_Commission this really sounds like a weak idea, only good for long discussions about exceptions and special cases. Ah, now I understand... @HerbertDorfmann

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales The Copyright Directive should absolutely be applied on online encyclopedias. Random uneducated users have power over what is truthful and how it's presented to the world, when wikipedia comes up 1st on google searches. Wiki administrators  just vandalise bios,& historic facts.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Sure, go ahead and burn the entire internet to the ground for the music industry in their spat with Youtube and similar services. You guys are absolutely brilliant.
@EU_Commission

@EU_Commission @VeraJourova @EU_Justice @ChristianWigand Could have sworn I saw a tweet from @CCHQPress claiming THEY had introduced these measures. Either I was mistaken, or they are two-faced,  lying Tory tossers.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales That first sentence is wrong. The proposal targets services that give access to large amounts of copyrighted content uploaded by users. Period. There is no further condition about copyright infringements or owning rights.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales And what about other stuff that uses copyrighted stuff? With that logic everyone would have to say their page/video/art is an encyclopedia to be allowed to keep it up. You better learn what the internet actually contains. :P

@EU_Commission @_Nickelfront Please explain to me what is the business of the social media management of the EU Commission in a political decision that is still to be voted on by the @EuParlament. This is incredible!

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales This answer is misleading! Some people CAN upload copyright content. If you lets say make a page of a movie and post the billboard of it...that photo IS copyrighted.
Its shameful that you mislead us #SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales wrong proposal

@EU_Commission @internetthought people currently have a bad enough time appealing to youtube surrounding copyright, with cases remaining unresolved for weeks/months. Imagine this on literally every platform 🤦‍♀️

@EU_Commission @internetthought people will be attempting to post memes and the like thousands of times PER DAY. Asking for it to be re-published will require a human person to review it - it will probably take days or just get outright ignored as the requests pile up and up

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales This is not true, @EU_Commission. I am both a Wikipedia volunteer and a city employee, and this involves uploading works of others in significant numbers and clearing it through OTRS _retroactively_.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales You, @EU_Commision, are behaving in a deeply despicable way by promoting abominable propaganda of some copyright maximalists, on a medium that wouldn't even exist if your proposal would have been law 10 years ago. #CensorshipMachines

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Thats the whole point. We are more than an encyclopedia. We are a database, a ‘stock image’ website, a travel guide, a map etc etc. And lots of things that the Internet has built, that are NOT encyclopedias but that we heavily rely on. And many more things to be invented.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales So the @EU_Commission thinks that principled opposition can be neutralised with a special carve-out for the opposer. Says it all, really.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Is this a serious attempt of misinforming your citizens? This version is outdated. If you don't even know what you're voting on, it shouldn't be voted on at all. Everyone just tries to proove how much pro copyright they are so they miss the point and start censoring legit content
@EU_Commission @internetthought Social media team... is this a proposal of the European Commission? Actually, no.  You'd best check with your bosses before tweeting nonsense.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Carve-outs are an admission that the proposed law is fundamentally broken.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales #Fakenews, false information, nonsense ruin society, the planet & the future and some act against free and #openknowledge? We will need many MANY & the smartest minds to master the future. Don't act against open and free knowledge, we need it, and it will also help your future.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Who determines what a "large" amount is? Maybe a little is a lot compared to nothing. Maybe today's little is a lot tomorrow. Maybe the wording should have matched the intent, but of course, the intent is really to cater to the movie and music industries here. Nothing more.
@EU_Commission Why not just ban the crap outright? Instead of having a #plasticbagtax. Same as cigarettes, why not ban them instead of increased tarrif... Oh wait more tax revenue bitches!
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales If this goes through, will the next step be outlawing VPNs? Like Russia and Chinas Censor systems, the EU desperately wants to copy.
@EU_Commission please can you give us more refugees and take Salvini instead?
@EU_Commission Non approvate la riforma sul copyright! Internet libero!

@EU_Commission @EU_MARE Dutch fishermen catch not only fish but also #marine #litter! About 350 ton’s each year! They are great. Witch country can improve thuis result? #workingforsustainability #fishingrentnotthecapital. Evenmore, does anyone know the most litter comes from land? Not from the sea!

@EU_Commission @EEAthina @UEmadrid @Avramopoulos @EUHomeAffairs @NatashaBertaud Soldi nostri. E il piatto piange ancora e di molto per l'Italia. Ve lo scrivo apposta in italiano, razza di buffoni che non siete altro!
@EU_Commission @peterrsimms The UK Conservatives are booking a holiday under these new rules, taking a break to look for their moral compass after claiming this was all thanks to them.

@EU_Commission @EEAthina @UEmadrid @Avramopoulos @EUHomeAffairs @NatashaBertaud Give Italy the money they spent and #closetheports , we are not Greece or Africa

Thank you
@EU_Commission Deeply inappropriate for the European Commission to be lobbying publicly *and* misleading the public in this way.
@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales Wow, does the EU commission have a propaganda arm that actively pushes not yet voted for proposals to citizens? EU sure takes lobbying to the next level.

@EU_Commission @jimmy_wales This is disastrous, and it shows how the decision makers in the EU are completely inept at making decisions when it includes the Internet. The practical side is impossible to implement without active censorship from online platforms.
@EU_Commission @EEAthina @UEmadrid @Avramopoulos @EUHomeAffairs @NatashaBertaud Me cojoni. Poi chiedetevi perché vi odiamo da queste parti. Noi da soli 5 volte tanto
